price: او څوك چې د خپل پالونکي په مخكې له درېدو ډار شوى او ځان يې له هوسونو ساتلى وي.
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفۡسَ عَنِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man khāfa maqāma rabbihi wanahā al-nafsa ʿani al-hawā
